name: Where Time Stood Still
description: Your plane has ditched on a mountain plateau somewhere in deepest Tibet. You and your companions are alive but recovery from the impact is short lived; a large shape is moving towards you. As it gets closer you rub your eyes in disbelief: a Dinosaur! Where are you?... and when?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
